shortdesc.ph: Retrieves information about cached music resources.
Retrieves information about cached music resources.

section.p: Before calling this method, you need to preallocate memory to store information about cached music resources. If you want to set the number of music resources that can be cached, you can configure it through the configuration parameter in . When these cached resources are no longer needed, you should release the memory in time to avoid memory leaks.

Before calling this method, you need to preallocate memory to store information about cached music resources. To set the number of cacheable music resources, configure the configuration parameter of . When the cached music resources are no longer needed, you should release the memory in time to avoid memory leaks.

plentry.pd: Output parameter. Pointer to the memory buffer used to store information about cached music resources. See .

Input and output parameter indicating the size of the array.
Input: Number of allocated structures.
Output: Number of structures returned after method execution.

ul.li: If the method call succeeds, returns an array of objects.
If the method call fails, returns null.
